thread.title: Snowden: Apple Should Fight Obama Administration On Encryption
thread.title_full: Snowden: Apple Should Fight Obama Administration On Encryption

author: Braden Goyette
title: Snowden: Apple Should Fight Obama Administration On Encryption
text:
Snowden: Apple Should Fight Obama Administration On Encryption The Intercept By Jenna McLaughlin Posted: 08/01/2015 10:51 AM EDT 
As the Obama administration campaign to stop the commercialization of strong encryption heats up, National Security Agency whistleblower Edward Snowden is firing back on behalf of the companies like Apple and Google that are finding themselves under attack.
